channel.title: [PI] HazePKz. The beginning of a new Era
channel.description:
[center][i][b]HazePkz[/b][/i][/center] [center][u][i]Information[/i][/u][/center] [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center] [center]Welcome[/center] [center]Hello my name is Omar, and i am fascinated by the evolution of Private Servers. Currently I am working on a PI/Project Insanity. Fist off let me say that Sanity is a great coder. Anyways, I have been coding for some time now and I am proud of my work. But i know things are missing and I need help with it. I appreciate that you take your time to look at this, and i hope you comment and or help.[/center] [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________ [/center] [center]Features[/center] [center][u][b]Skills:[/b][/u][/center] [center]Range: 100% It has perfect animation and the hits are proper ;D Prayer: 100% Prayer works perfect, Draining, Altar and all that. I want to fix turmoil pray however. Magic: 99% I want to change the animation of the teleportation, i am bored of the old way.
Most of the other skills works, just need to add the finishing touches.[/center] [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center] [center][u][b]Quest Tab[/b][/u][/center] [center]My idea of the quest tab was to make it have the information of the player, like the Name, rank, combat level, slayer task, how many friends online, players online, and other general information.
I also plan having fun custom quests.[/center] [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center][b][u]Minigames[/u][/b][/center] [center]Currently the mingames are basic, Pest Control Fight Pits Fight Cave Barrows Duel Arena I plain to add some fun custom mingames.[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________ [center] [center]Those are what HazePkz has to offer, and i want to improve it. I am currently working on the media so please be patient. I have planned for a hoster for the server and i will be getting a VPS. Somebody who knows how to work with the PI client will great since it is not my strong area. [/center] [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center] If you would like to join in the creation of something great please leave the following information:
Name: Age: Strength (What area you are strong in): Email/MSN: Comment: [center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]Thank-you for your time it is appreciated. My email: fmcomar@hotmail.com
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/6531/hazepkbanner.jpg[/img] [img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/8830/87957289.jpg[/img]

item.title: [PI] HazePKz. The beginning of a new Era
item.dc:creator: @Regiciide Regiciide
item.description:
@Regiciide wrote:

and actually let me explain what you need to do, select some colors dl some brushes and fonts, pick several brushes fade them in make some nice overlap, add image, get a render slowly use select tool pic the image from the render u want then click feather 5.00 then invert, so it has a glow effect copy that and post on sig then use dodge and smudge tool to add a smoke coming off the render that ends with light tips, then we get to hardest part the font, you use several techniques to add effect but my favorite is this, make a text then alpha to selection go to gradient tool and pick two colors then go down then make new layer then click grow 5 then use fill and use w.e color then take new layer put it under font layer and u get outline ten wit alpha still on add some brushes to add effect. and that is a simple sig that i can make so watch yourself and haze you could just kick the other guy out and i could make your graphics

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] HazePKz. The beginning of a new Era
item.dc:creator: @HazePkz HazePkz
item.description:
@HazePkz wrote:

[center]HazePkz[/center]
[center]Information[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]Welcome[/center]
[center]Hello my name is Omar, and i am fascinated by the evolution of Private Servers. Currently I am working on a PI/Project Insanity. Fist off let me say that Sanity is a great coder. Anyways, I have been coding for some time now and I am proud of my work. But i know things are missing and I need help with it. I appreciate that you take your time to look at this, and i hope you comment and or help.[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/center]
[center]Features[/center]
[center]Skills:[/center]
[center]Range: 100% It has perfect animation and the hits are proper ;D
Prayer: 100% Prayer works perfect, Draining, Altar and all that. I want to fix turmoil pray however.
Magic: 99% I want to change the animation of the teleportation, i am bored of the old way.

Most of the other skills works, just need to add the finishing touches.[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]Quest Tab[/center]
[center]My idea of the quest tab was to make it have the information of the player, like the Name, rank, combat level, slayer task, how many friends online, players online, and other general information.

I also plan having fun custom quests.[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Minigames[/center]
[center]Currently the mingames are basic,
Pest Control
Fight Pits
Fight Cave
Barrows
Duel Arena
I plain to add some fun custom mingames.[/center]

[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center]
[center]Those are what HazePkz has to offer, and i want to improve it. I am currently working on the media so please be patient. I have planned for a hoster for the server and i will be getting a VPS. Somebody who knows how to work with the PI client will great since it is not my strong area.
[/center]
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
If you would like to join in the creation of something great please leave the following information:

Name:
Age:
Strength (What area you are strong in):
Email/MSN:
Comment:
[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Thank-you for your time it is appreciated.
My email: fmcomar@hotmail.com


Read full topic
